sentence: Arizona voters will still be able to vote early, access drop boxes, and make their voices heard.pic.twitter.com/awWo5A6PF3 â€” Secretary Katie Hobbs (@Secretary Katie Hobbs) 1649203544 Hobbs is currently seeking the Democratic gubernatorial nomination.
author: Brandon Gage
title: 'Petitioners have not persuaded the Court': Arizona Supreme Court tosses GOP lawsuit to eliminate early voting

sentence: "Today, the Arizona Supreme Court dismissed a dangerous lawsuit that threatened early voting in the state and challenged provisions of the Elections Procedures Manual," tweeted Katie Hobbs, Arizona's Democratic secretary of state.
author: Jon Skolnik
title: GOP-led Arizona Supreme Court shuts down Republican bid to ban early voting

author: Chibueze Godwin
title: Arizona Supreme Court Rejects GOP Move To Abolish Mail Voting
